DbDetails.DbTable: tms.xtmst_dispatchplan x left join tms.xtmsm_vehicle x0 on x.vehicleid=x0.vehicleid left join tms.xtmst_freight x1 on x.freightid=x1.freightid left join tms.xtmsc_status_option x2 on x.status=x2.statuscode left join tms.xtmsm_xsite x3 on x.fromxsiteid=x3.xsiteid left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x4 on x.fromcityid=x4.cityid left join tms.xtmsm_xsite x5 on x.toxsiteid=x5.xsiteid left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x6 on x.tocityid=x6.cityid left join tms.xtmst_vehiclerealtime x7 on x.vehiclerealtimeid=x7.vehiclerealtimeid left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x8 on x.deliverymode=x8.typecode left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x9 on x.consignmentmode=x9.typecode left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x10 on x.deliverymethod=x10.typecode
DbDetails.Queryformat: select %{data} from (select x.xtmst_dispatchplan_id from %{dbtable} where x.carrierid='%{orgguid}' %{where} GROUP BY x.xtmst_dispatchplan_id ORDER BY x.xtmst_dispatchplan_id) t
